e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Guarda Municipal captura jiboia em bairro de Guareí</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Moradores encontraram a cobra no bairro CDHU. Jiboia foi capturada e devolvida ao meio ambiente.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="6"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/natureza/noticia/atualizado-pela-1a-vez-em-30-anos-atlas-traz-12-novos-tipos-de-nuvens.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/tk9W-a4lAdf2_YMndlf06VuVAwA=/540x304/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/zB-EU0GJ0iFkzS_jfEpS9khZd5w=/810x456/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/Re_coF9AOZC_kG1hZdOq1r_ncDo=/1080x608/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/tk9W-a4lAdf2_YMndlf06VuVAwA=/540x304/top/smart/https://i.s3.glbimg.com/v1/AUTH_59edd422c0c84a879bd37670ae4f538a/internal_photos/bs/2017/e/D/NMuqu6QFuQfeY80Vs2MA/asperitas.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Natureza</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">ontem</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/natureza/noticia/atualizado-pela-1a-vez-em-30-anos-atlas-traz-12-novos-tipos-de-nuvens.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Atualizado pela 1ª vez em 30 anos, atlas traz 12 &#039;novos&#039; tipos de nuvens</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Elaborada originalmente no século 19, publicação é referência global para identificação de nuvens na meteorologia, navegação e avião.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="7"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/sp/campinas-regiao/plano-de-voo/noticia/supercamera-registra-imagens-exclusivas-do-mundo-pelo-olhar-de-ave-durante-voo-veja-videos.ghtml" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover bstn-fd-video-cover" style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" alt="Supercâmera registra imagens exclusivas do mundo pelo olhar de ave durante voo; Reportagem faz parte da série Plano de Voo, da EPTV.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div hidrotermal&#039;.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div professor.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div         		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/copa-do-mundo/selecoes.html" class="item">seleções</a>

        	<li class="diretorio-indice">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/todos-os-esportes.html" class="item">esportes</a>
        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/campeonato" class="item">campeonatos</a>
        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/atleta" class="item">atletas</a>
        	</li>

        	</li>
        
        	<li class="diretorio-indice item-destacado">
        		<a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/noticia/plantao.html" class="item">últimas notícias</a>
        	</li>
        
        </ul>
    </div>
</section>
